sentences.en: "But Jesus is here!" the priest intoned.
sentences.cn: “但是耶稣在这里！”牧师吟诵道。

sentences.en: According to the Christian religion,Jesus Christ resurrected from death.
sentences.cn: 根据基督教的说法，耶稣基督曾死而复生。

sentences.en: Actually Christmas Day is not the day on which Jesus Christ was born.
sentences.cn: 事实上,圣诞节并不是耶稣基督诞生的日子.

sentences.en: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.cn: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.en: Christians believe in God and Jesus.
sentences.cn: 基督教徒信奉上帝和耶稣.

sentences.en: He put halos around the head of Jesus Christ.
sentences.cn: 他在耶稣基督头上画上光环.

sentences.en: His novel about Jesus caused a furore among Christians.
sentences.cn: 他关于耶稣的小说激起了基督教徒的公愤。

sentences.en: I lapsed in my 20s, returned to it, then lapsed again, while writing the life of historical Jesus.
sentences.cn: 我20多岁时曾经停止信教，后来一度又信，再后来撰写历史上耶稣的生平故事时又再脱教。

sentences.en: It is important that we put Jesus into the context of history.
sentences.cn: 我们将耶稣置于历史环境中来看是很重要的。

sentences.en: Jesus is believed by Christians to have been divine.
sentences.cn: 基督教徒们相信耶稣是神.

sentences.en: Jesus went out into the wilderness to think alone.
sentences.cn: 耶稣走进荒野去独自思考.

sentences.en: Judas was one of the twelve disciples of Jesus.
sentences.cn: 犹大是耶稣十二门徒之一.

sentences.en: Pilate ordered Jesus to be brought forth.
sentences.cn: 彼拉多命令把耶稣带上来。

sentences.en: The story was used to emphasize the humanity of Jesus.
sentences.cn: 人们用这个故事来强调耶稣人性的一面。

sentences.en: They brought the children to Jesus and he blessed them.
sentences.cn: 他们把孩子带到耶稣跟前，耶稣祝福了他们。

sentences.en: What do you want with us, Jesus of Nazareth?
sentences.cn: 拿撒勒的耶稣，我们与你有什么相干？

trans.tran_cn: 耶稣，杰西（男子名），[电影]耶稣传
trans.tran_en: the man who Christians believe was the son of God, and on whose life and ideas Christianity is based
